name: Appartment Seyer
description: The house is situated in a quiet, sunny position, enjoying good views in Ginzling, approx. 500 metres from the village centre, ski bus stop, pratice lift and toboggan run approx. 500m away, nearest guest house 300m.
Prices excluding stream.  Raised prices at Christmas and carnival!
Use the Zillertal main throughfare, the B169 to Mayrhofen, then on to Ginzling (approx. 9km from Mayrhofen).

makesOffer.name: Holiday home, bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Enjoy todays luxuries in a mountain world, as if it was 200 years ago. A fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and oven, and Sat-TV for quiet evenings in. A large couch and table, and a wonderful traditional tiled stove with a colourful bench.
